column2: (verb) to pay someone money in exchange for something that has been lost or damaged or for some problem
(adj) having a lot of ideas and enthusiasm
(adj) good at thinking of and doing new and difficult things, especially things that will make money
(verb) to use something in a way that helps you
(noun) something that encourages a person to do something
(adj) very small in amount or effect
(noun) the quality of being good an deserving praise
(verb) to encourage people to like, buy, use, do or support something
(verb) to give up a job or position by telling your employer that you are leaving
